## ProgramBuilder.textureStore() method

Same as textureStore builtin function in WGSL, only valid for WebGPU device

**Signature:**

```typescript
textureStore(tex: PBShaderExp, coords: number | PBShaderExp, value: PBShaderExp): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tex | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |
|  coords | number \| [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |
|  value | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |

**Returns:**

void
